comment.body: @nofish main issue is recursive call on line 250 and 251 of MergerSitePlugin.py - i commented out and errors stop. Are they critical?

@Kaffie On Infinity Hub i have to click 'rebuild DB' in sidebar to see my new posts/edits, but it's an instant result. Posts show up immediately. Edits i reload page. The posts/edits/comments are still being published to peers, so everyone else sees them, just my own don't show. Still checking why....
My python is weak, but been coding w/ 0net about 6 months.
Infinity welcomes you. =)
20 accounts. biggest is 20k. I've gotta post more to hit the limit first. (too lazy to put mine down)
Still receiving and didn't switch anything.

Ah i c. But yeh.. long post one hour ago. I don't see your follow list, but mine is also missing so that could be me. Of cors when i click on your hub it tells me i have to switch hubs. Are you making it public hub?
Ah yes, i see you now on the seeded hubs list. (there's 2 of you)

I just spent time making a graphic (button) to the hubs page. I'll prolly clone the hub page to my site next. That hub page is the main entrance for ZeroMe so hard to miss it. Welcome to hub-ville. =)
You're also in the ZeroHello hub section. The hub page is "centralized" as a dot-bit, but your hub is there below mine for everyone to see.

Hubs are not like that. As you said, they're public by default. There's just a slight delay for them to show up. The first day i didn't see any avatars next to mine, but they're there today. When you're running a hub, we sometimes see different results than others, like something is missing when it's not.

Running a hub is still a bit "bug-ie". I still have to click "rebuild DB" about have the time to see my edits or posts. But the hub page there are 4 hubs to join. I just clicked join on yours and it works fine. It posted "Hello ZeroMe".
Nope. I'm on my hub and it posted straight our to your peers fine. On mine i don't have the "follow everyone" option because it was just added, but yours has it.
How many user folders so far?

I'd have to go boot my desktop machine to confirm. But i didn't click/seed anything and your hub is in those hub lists. As far as i understood it, when we put "merged-hub" in the json then 0net informs the hub sections there's a new hub available. I don't know what triggers a seed. You hub has 20 according to ZeroHello.

It's not put there manually. Mine was listed the moment i published. Only the avatars didn't show. Of cors someone who joins your site is seeding it, but Kaffie show 3 members, and 20 seeds, so as you said, sharing content from your hub seeds it. But i didn't click any link. (well, i clicked, but only got the text telling me to use ZeroMe)

Okay, we're not defaults, i get it. Just as we're not in the "more sites" section on ZeroHello. So what you mean is that because i'm following you and you posted from your hub then i could see it. Btw, did you get any console errors? (conflicts)
Yeh, was merging them too soon, so wasn't sure which was causing the issue. P2P suggested it was the ZeroMe code causing it, so it's good to hear yours is fine.
Welcome!
Feature, not a bug. :)
